notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: R.v.W., S.K., C.J.R.,Â and A.U. conceptualized the model, A.U. complied the climate change information, C.J.R. compiled the El nino information, C.W.C. wrote the R code, R.v.W. wrote the Open BUGS code, R.v.W. wrote the first draft, and R.v.W., C.J.R., C.W.C., S.K. and A.U. revised and edited the manuscript.
